name: Nenokatas
overview: "Japan is the end now." The President pressed a switch button. The nuclear bomb set 100km below ground did not explode though. "Why...?" Villains were surprised. "Go to Nenokatas-country and remove the bomb." Mazingnurse said. Namataro went down to the nether world. You have to defeat four bosses and have to find the bomb in the deepest place.
